parameters: You already rang the bell, let's not insist.
To finish our lesson about lightings I will
introduce a new feature : the Kuchulem_Areas
Areas are rectangular zones you can define for
You can combine several areas to create a
single area with a more complex shape.
For example, in this map I defined 13 areas.
9 of them are combined to define the Hall, 3
of them compose the room left to the hall.
The last area is the landing above the counter.
Areas have no use on their own but some
See how your sight and the lanterns light
This is because you and the center of those
When the player is inside an area, his sight
is limited to that area. This is very usefull
to block the sight with walls.
The same goes for light sources and highlights.

NPCs are defined thanks to the Kuchulem_Npcs
It allows you to define characters and attach
NPCs are defined with an appearence and a face.
They also have a first name and last name.
You can define caracteristics for them, it can
be anything that fits your needs.
It is time to introduce the Kuchulem_Convos
plugin. This one relies on the Kuchulem_Npcs
With this plugin you will be able define the
by an event and turn them to an easy to build
For example, our conversation is a set of
messages for witch the speaker is the NPC
So all messages you see have my face and name.
You can also define another NPC as speaker,
See ? You can then alternate between NPCs for
speakers to involve multiple characters in the
Actually there is also a command to set the

This makes events more easy to manage when they
concern characters that change along the story,
either in their appearance, face or other
